official_title: BEACON Study: Virtual Coping Skills Groups for Cancer Patients, Survivors and Their Caregivers
inclusion_criteria:
* Lived experience as either a current cancer patient, cancer survivor or caregiver of someone with cancer
* Adult - 18+
* Has health insurance provided by employer or union (can be dependent of person on insurance)
* Read/speak English
* Have access to internet and personal email account
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Severe mental illness that is disruptive to other group members
